vcluster.plugin

Class PluginManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • vcluster.plugin.PluginManager

  • public class PluginManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for managing plugins,including loading plugins into the JVM,unloading plugins,maintaining a plugin list.
    Author:
    kjwon15 modified by Dada Huang

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private CustomClassLoader cl
      An instance of CustomClassLoader,it is responsible for loading classes form jar files.
      static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,vcluster.engine.groupexecutor.ProxyExecutor> plugins
      A collection to store all the loaded plugin classes,indexed by the class name.
      private java.lang.String pluginsdir
      Directory where the plugin jar files are located.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PluginManager()
      Constructor with no parameter,initialize the pluginsdir as "plugins",which is the default plugins directory.
      PluginManager(java.lang.String dir)
      Plugin management class constructor.Initialize the collection of plugins,the plugins directory and the CustomClassLoader.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getList()
      Get a plugins list of all plugins in the directory,but does not load them.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> GetLoadedPlugins()
      Get loaded plugins.
      void LoadAllPlugins()
      Loads all plugins from the plugin directory.
      void LoadPlugin(java.lang.String name)
      Loads a specified plugin(JAR file) into the JVM from the plugin directory.
      void UnloadAllPlugins()
      Unload all loaded plugins, and invoke the function clear() to empty the plugins collection, all the plugin objects will be collected by the System.gc()
      void UnloadPlugin(java.lang.String name)
      Unload a specified plugin.remove the plugin form the plugins collection
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> walk(java.lang.String path)
      Scan the plugins directiory get all the paths of JAR file

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        An instance of CustomClassLoader,it is responsible for loading classes form jar files.

      • pluginsdir

        Directory where the plugin jar files are located.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PluginManager

        public PluginManager(java.lang.String dir)
        Plugin management class constructor.Initialize the collection of plugins,the plugins directory and the CustomClassLoader.
        Parameters:
        dir - A directory where plugins are located.

      • PluginManager

        public PluginManager()
        Constructor with no parameter,initialize the pluginsdir as "plugins",which is the default plugins directory.
        See Also:
        PluginManager(String).

    • Method Detail

      • LoadPlugin

        public void LoadPlugin(java.lang.String name)
                throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Loads a specified plugin(JAR file) into the JVM from the plugin directory.
        Parameters:
        name - JAR file name without the extension ".jar",case sensitive.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

      • LoadAllPlugins

        public void LoadAllPlugins()
        Loads all plugins from the plugin directory.
        See Also:
        LoadPlugin(String)

      • getList

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getList()
        Get a plugins list of all plugins in the directory,but does not load them.
        Returns:
        List

      • walk

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> walk(java.lang.String path)
        Scan the plugins directiory get all the paths of JAR file
        Parameters:
        path - a path to be explore.
        Returns:
        a list of paths.
        See Also:
        LoadAllPlugins()

      • UnloadPlugin

        public void UnloadPlugin(java.lang.String name)
                  throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Unload a specified plugin.remove the plugin form the plugins collection
        Parameters:
        name - a plugin name to be unloaded.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

      • UnloadAllPlugins

        public void UnloadAllPlugins()
                      throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Unload all loaded plugins, and invoke the function clear() to empty the plugins collection, all the plugin objects will be collected by the System.gc()
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        See Also:
        UnloadPlugin(String)

      • GetLoadedPlugins

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> GetLoadedPlugins()
        Get loaded plugins.
        Returns:
        a list of plugin names.
